data.prayer: Father, help the 2,116 believers in Ash Sharqiyah South to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 321,784 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ash Sharqiyah South, Oman

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Ash Sharqiyah South to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Ash Sharqiyah South, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, move the 2,116 believers in the state of Ash Sharqiyah South to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Persian people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Ash Sharqiyah South, Oman to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ash Sharqiyah South. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ash Sharqiyah South, Oman has a population of 323,900.

We estimate Ash Sharqiyah South has 2,116 people who might know Jesus, 7,108 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 314,676 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 153 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 314,676 lost people in  Ash Sharqiyah South, Oman have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
